casebody.data:
ENGINEERED MAINTENANCE SERVICES, INC. (also known as Engineered Maintenance Services), Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 03-5100. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. March 8, 2004. C. Paul Davis, Principal Attorney, Mun-ger & Davis, Huntsville, AL, for Plaintiff-Appellant. Gary J. Dernelle, Principal Attorney, Bryant G. Snee, David M. Cohen, of Counsel, Department of Justice, Washington, DC, Kevin K. Robitaille, Gregory B. Coe, of Counsel, Department of the Army, Arlington, VA, for Defendant-Appellee.

Before MAYER, Chief Judge, LOURIE and LINN, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDER and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
